name: discord-bot
description: Discord 음성 채널 활동 추적 봇

scripts.setup: pkg install python nodejs postgresql clang make && npm install
scripts.external: ERRSOLE_HOST=0.0.0.0 pm2 start ecosystem-termux.config.cjs --env production && pm2 logs discord-bot
scripts.ip: termux-wifi-connectioninfo | grep 'ip_address' || ip route get 1.1.1.1 | grep -oP 'src \K\S+' || echo '핸드폰에서 설정 > Wi-Fi에서 IP 확인'
scripts.update: git pull && pm2 delete discord-bot 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 start ecosystem-termux.config.cjs --env production && pm2 logs discord-bot
